sentences.english: After Houston, we have a very tough 4-game east coast road trip against Detroit, Boston, Philly and New Jersey.
sentences.chinese: 之后我们又要去东海岸和凯尔特人等强队进行交手。

sentences.english: On Terephon, Luke beheaded her after a struggle.
sentences.chinese: 卢克在泰雷丰与卢米娅交手，斩下了她的首级。

sentences.english: One thing that stands out however, is how competitve the encounters have been.
sentences.chinese: 值得一提的是，这几次交手竞争很激烈。

sentences.english: Vritra ninety-nine fortresses, and then came upon the dragon .
sentences.chinese: 因陀罗摧毁了维他的九十九座城堡，然后与维他交手。

sentences.english: The last time the sides met in the competition was at the semi-final stage in 1992.
sentences.chinese: 两队最近一次在联赛杯交手是在1992年的半决赛。

sentences.english: It is on offer every time the teams meet in a Six Nations contest.
sentences.chinese: 每次两队在六国赛交手时，都会给胜者颁发这项奖杯。

sentences.english: Tang wall and cheng bite play gold few rounds.
sentences.chinese: 唐壁与程咬金交手没几个回合。

sentences.english: Xabi Alonso, Albert Riera and Alvaro Arbeloa will also be hoping to play against the host nation.
sentences.chinese: 阿隆索列拉阿贝罗阿也有望上场与东道主交手。

sentences.english: Inside the spacious interior of the Galactic Senate chambers, Yoda challenged the Emperor.
sentences.chinese: 尤达与皇帝在银河议院宏伟的大厅内交手。

sentences.english: They have faced the Madridistas 29 times at the Bernabéu, winning only twice.
sentences.chinese: 他们在伯纳乌29次和皇马交手，只取得过两次胜利。

sentences.english: Each team plays each other once, with home advantage alternating on a yearly basis.
sentences.chinese: 每年各队互相交手一次，主场则是每年轮换一次。

sentences.english: But when the organization was hit by the killer and instant spike and thus injured.
sentences.chinese: 但当于组织杀手交手时被瞬间秒杀并因此受了伤。

sentences.english: This time to conquer the Central Plains Dynasty is the first time dealing with the South Vietnamese people.
sentences.chinese: 这一次征服是中原王朝第一次与南越人交手。

sentences.english: Ding Junhui said he felt lucky to have the chance to play against world-class opponents.
sentences.chinese: 能和世界级高手交手，丁俊晖说自己感到很幸运。

sentences.english: Small rascal how can with once kill people of does the soldier exchange blows?
sentences.chinese: 小流氓怎么能和杀过人的士兵交手呢？

sentences.english: Anyway I also didn't exchange blows with others for a long time, in the mind's returning is really a little bit carefree alarm.
sentences.chinese: 反正我也好久没和人交手了，心里还真是有点闲得慌。
